name: MASKED TACTICS
description:
Prototype for a Tactical RPG with collectible cards that represent your skills. Some elements are still not yet completed, BUT it is playable!

Please check it out and criticize me! You can be even mean, for the sake of making this game better 

Word of caution - tutorial sucks.

Walls of text are all I can do for now, cuz I'm still working on other mechanics

OOPS...
